vulcanROM_V2_1.brief: A small update to Vulcan ROM
vulcanROM_V2_1.description: - Strong Integrity - Ringtone picker fixed (secsound) - Google Assistant voice commands fixed - Snapchat camera fixed - DressRoom ambient mode added - Sketch tool image (In gallery and notes) - Portrait effects
